# deltastream_region (Data Source)

Region resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "deltastream_region" "use1" {
  name = "AWS us-east-1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the Region

### Read-Only

- `cloud` (String) Cloud provider of the Region
- `region` (String) Cloud provider region
